remarks: Condition determining equality of two trace-preserving endomorphisms. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendof.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendof.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendof.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoeq1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E ) /\ A. f e. T ( U ` f ) = ( V ` f ) ) -> U = V ) $.
$d K f $.
$d T f $.
$d U f $.
$d V f $.
$d W f $.
